price: Ẹni tí ó bá ń gbèrò (oore) ayé yìí (nìkan), A máa taari ohun tí A bá fẹ́ sí i nínú rẹ̀ ní kíákíá fún ẹni tí A bá fẹ́. Lẹ́yìn náà, A máa ṣe iná Jahanamọ fún un; ó máa wọ inú rẹ̀ ní ẹni yẹpẹrẹ, ẹni ẹ̀kọ̀.
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ عَجَّلۡنَا لَهُۥ فِيهَا مَا نَشَآءُ لِمَن نُّرِيدُ ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ يَصۡلَىٰهَا مَذۡمُومٗا مَّدۡحُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu al-ʿājilata ʿajjalnā lahu fīhā mā nashāu liman nurīdu thumma jaʿalnā lahu jahannama yaṣlāhā madhmūman madḥūran
